template.template: Template AD DS Monitoring and Attack Detection
template.name: Template AD DS Monitoring and Attack Detection

item.name: Windows Security (ID4618)
item.description: A monitored security event pattern has occurred.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4621)
item.description: Administrator recovered system from CrashOnAuditFail. Users who are not administrators will now be allowed to log on. Some auditable activity might not have been recorded.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4649)
item.description: A replay attack was detected. May be a harmless false positive due to misconfiguration error.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4692)
item.description: Backup of data protection master key was attempted.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4693)
item.description: Recovery of data protection master key was attempted.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4706)
item.description: A new trust was created to a domain.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4714)
item.description: Encrypted data recovery policy was changed.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4715)
item.description: The audit policy (SACL) on an object was changed.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4765)
item.description: SID History was added to an account.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4766)
item.description: An attempt to add SID History to an account failed.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4794)
item.description: An attempt was made to set the Directory Services Restore Mode.

item.name: Windows Security (ID4964)
item.description: Special groups have been assigned to a new logon.

item.name: Windows Security (ID5124)
item.description: A security setting was updated on the OCSP Responder Service.

trigger.expression: {Template AD DS Monitoring and Attack Detection:eventlog[Security,,,,^4621$].logseverity(0)}>1 and {Template AD DS Monitoring and Attack Detection:eventlog[Security,,,,^4621$].nodata(600)}=0
trigger.name: Administrator recovered system from CrashOnAuditFail.
trigger.description: Administrator recovered system from CrashOnAuditFail. Users who are not administrators will now be allowed to log on. Some auditable activity might not have been recorded.

trigger.expression: {Template AD DS Monitoring and Attack Detection:eventlog[Security,,,,^4618$].logseverity(0)}>1 and {Template AD DS Monitoring and Attack Detection:eventlog[Security,,,,^4618$].nodata(600)}=0
trigger.name: A monitored security event pattern has occurred.
trigger.description: A monitored security event pattern has occurred.
